name: Santa's Skating Snowmen (winterwonderjam 2022 entry)
description:
This is my entry for this years "winter wonder jam'', with the theme being organised chaos. my incorporation of the theme is with chaotic scenes of snowmen iceskating, while working for someone in an organised setting. the gameplay combines movement and momentum based mechanics with a delivery sim.

note: i didnt have time for any music, so i used Vivaldi's Winter from his four seasons, as it is public domain and i will not profit from this game.

note 2: this is my first real finished game, it is pretty good compared to my other work but not nearly as optimised and more rough then some other games might be. it was a fun experience and i made something i am proud of though and that whats its about
